affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target, Point Target
AFFECTS: Heroes
cmb:
MANA COST: 100/120/140/160
COOLDOWN: 11/10/9/8
desc: Sprouts a ring of trees around a unit, trapping it in place.
notes:
Sprout can be cast on any unit, or the ground.
Trees created by Sprout have the same interactions with abilities as regular trees.
lore: Verdant overgrowth is a common ailment reported by Nature's Prophet's attackers.
name: furion_sprout

cmb:
MANA COST: 50/50/50/50
COOLDOWN: 50/40/30/20
desc: Teleports to any point on the map.
notes:
Teleport takes 3 seconds to cast.
Mana and cooldown take effect when the cast is completed. Nature's Prophet will not use any mana or waste the cooldown if the spell is interrupted while casting.
When the cast begins, an effect is created at the target location, which is visible to allies and enemies.
lore: The Prophet keeps his sentinel over the forest, protecting it when in need.
name: furion_teleportation

cmb:
MANA COST: 160/160/160/160
COOLDOWN: 37
desc: Converts an area of trees into Treants. Treants have 550 hit points and deal 21-23 damage.
notes:
Nature's Call can only create as many trees there are in the target area.
Treants have no magic resistance.
lore: Verodicia bestowed the Prophet with the ability to summon the Treant Guard, a mythical sentient army of the wild.
name: furion_force_of_nature

affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target, Point Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE: Magical
attrib:
MAX TARGETS: 16 / 16 / 16
DAMAGE: 140 / 180 / 225
DAMAGE ADDITION PER BOUNCE: 7%
SCEPTER MAX TARGETS: 18 / 18 / 18
SCEPTER DAMAGE: 155 / 210 / 275
cmb:
MANA COST: 175/225/275
COOLDOWN: 90/75/60
desc:
Damaging energy bounces around the map, striking enemies close to the cast point that are in vision. Each enemy hit beyond the first adds damage.
Upgradable with Aghanim's Scepter.
notes:
Wrath of Nature will not hit units out of vision.
Can be cast through the minimap; the nearest valid target will be selected.
lore: Nature's Prophet calls Verodicia's fury to strike down those who might ravage the wilderness.
name: furion_wrath_of_nature
